articles.title: Nigerians Cant Start 2026 With More Taxes - Kachikwu to Tinubu
articles.summary: Former presidential candidate of the African Democratic Congress (ADC), Mr. Dumebi Kachikwu, has cautioned President Bola Tinubu against introducing additional taxes in the new year. He warned that further fiscal pressure on Nigerians could deepen hardship and spark a crisis of unprecedented proportions. In his New Year message to Nigerians, Kachikwu said the country could not begin 2026 with more taxes at a time when millions of citizens were gr

articles.title: Road deaths in NI : Fifty - seven people died in 2025
articles.summary: Fifty-seven people died on NI roads in 2025 34 minutes ago Share Save Share Save Getty Images Fifty-seven people died on Northern Ireland's roads in 2025, according to provisional figures released by the Police Service of Northern Ireland (PSNI). A total of 69 people lost their lives on the roads the previous year. The figures have been released as Infrastructure Minister Liz Kimmins urged the public to focus on road safety as 2026 gets under way

articles.title: Boy , 15 , dies in e - bike crash in Tasmania north on New Year Eve
articles.summary: Boy, 15, dies in e-bike crash in Tasmania's north on New Year's Eve By Hayden Smith Topic: Road Accidents and Incidents 5h ago 5 hours ago Thu 1 Jan 2026 at 2:22am The teenager died after his e-bike crashed into a pole. ( ABC News: Sandy Powell ) In short: A teenage boy died after his electric bicycle struck a pole in Tasmania's north-west. The incident occurred hours after a 72-year-old died when his motorcycle veered into a culvert near Campbel
